bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: peak-illness. The fifth is exhaustion peak-illness. These [designations] are based on the respective point of departure. Also, there is buffalo, horse, hog, chicken, and dog peak-illness. These names are based on the sounds emitted and shapes assumed by patients at the time of the outbreak of the disease when they resemble a buffalo, or a horse, etc”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 fails to give these details.

a) the five poisonous pharmaceutical substances: dan sha 丹砂 , shi dan 石 膽 , xiong huang 雄黃 , yu shi 礜石 , ci shi 磁石 . Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry dan sha 丹砂：鄭康成 注《周禮》，以丹砂、石膽、雄黃、礜石、磁石為五毒，古人惟以攻創 瘍 , “In his comment on the Zhou li , Zheng Kangcheng regards dan sha , shi dan , xiong huang , yu shi , and ci shi as the five poisons . In ancient times people relied on nothing else to cope with sores and ulcers”.

b) The five types of gu du 蠱 毒 , gu poison, i. e., she gu 蛇蠱 , snake gu ; qiang lang gu 蜣螂蠱 , dung beetle gu ; ha ma gu 蝦蟆蠱 , toad gu ; ke dou gu 蝌蚪蠱 ; cao gu 草蠱 , herbal gu . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry tao xiao 桃梟：殺精魅五毒不祥 , “It serves to kill what is inauspicious, such as spirit seduction-specters and the five poisons .

c) Combined Designation of all types of du qi 毒 氣 , poison qi, that bring forth sores and ulcers, including dong fang qing du 東方 青毒 , greenish poison of the East; nan fang chi du 南方赤毒 , red poison of the South; xi fang bai du 西方白毒 , white poison of the West; bei fang hei du 北方黑 毒 , black poison of the North; zhong yang huang du 中央黃毒 , yellow poison of the center. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 29: 禁五毒法：吸東方青毒，南方赤毒，西方白毒，北方 黑毒，中央黃毒。天毒、地毒、水毒、火毒、霧毒、塵毒、死生毒，百 毒之精，知汝姓名，天毒上升，地毒下藏，百毒止息，五毒滅亡。惡毒 須出，毒腦破，毒腹出，毒腸止。不止不已，拘汝牙、折汝齒。吸吸叱 叱。急急如律令 , “Method to banish the five poisons : ‘I inhale greenish poison of the East, red poison of the South, white poison of the West, black poison of the North, yellow poison of the center. Heaven’s poison, earth’s poison, poison of water, poison of fire, poison of fog, poison of dirt, poison of death and life, spirits of all poisons: I know your names! Heaven’s poison rise! Earth’s poison descend and be stored! The hundred poisons stop; the five poisons vanish. Malign poisons must come out. Poison in the brain will be broken. Poison in the abdomen will come out. Poison in the intestine will stop. If you do not halt, if you do not end, I will grasp your teeth, I will break your teeth.’ Inhale, inhale, shout, shout: ‘Quick, quick, this is like a command! ’”
